text: Step 1 BEEN left right v v ~ 300000 A A i j def partition(nums, left, right): Ry i, j = left, right # Bl nums[left] MEEH while i < j: while i < j and nums[j] >= nums[left]l: # MAEERENM FEERNTE j-=1 while i < j and nums[i] <= nums[left]: # MEBGREMATFEERNTE i+=1 nums[il, nums[j] = nums[j], nums[i] # XN TR nums[i], nums[left] = nums[left], nums[i] # BEAEBRERNFRANS RE return i # BREEERIERS| wiw.hello-algo. com
